ValidationRule.description: You shouldn't have an subcases or notes on unrelated calls
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Care_Note_Count__c > 0, Number_of_CN_Offered__c > 0, Number_of_Care_Requests_Offered__c > 0 ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Unrelated Call") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure to delete any Care Requests, Care Navigation, or Notes before marking a call as unrelated
